casebody.data:
People of North Carolina, ex rel. Christopher Charles Friscia and Maria Adriana Friscia
v.
Nathan J. Taylor, et al. d/b/a Nathan J. Taylor, Mcguire Woods LLP, et al., Law Firm No. 389P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 8, 2016. Mr. Christopher Charles Friscia, Pro Se. Mr. Nathan J. Taylor, Attorney at Law, Pro Se.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Petitioner on the 13th of October 2016 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Mecklenburg County:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of December 2016."
